id,
user_number,
user_name,
user_sex,

target_organization_id,
user_nation,
change_reason,
state,

birthday,

mapper.update:
update service_change_organization
user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgin_organization_id = #{orginOrganizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_organization_id = #{targetOrganizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_nation = #{userNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_reason = #{changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=BIT},
application_date = #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update service_change_organization set user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgin_organization_id = #{orginOrganizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_organization_id = #{targetOrganizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_nation = #{userNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_reason = #{changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=BIT}, application_date = #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select organization_id as id from sys_organizational_structure where organization_name=#{newTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
